coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.description: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top. Sometimes you can find variations that use cream instead of milk or ones that throw in flavor shot, as well.

coffees.name: Black-coffee
coffees.description: just blakc coffe DO NOT by it what so ever !!!

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: With a similar flavor to black coffee, the americano consists of an espresso shot diluted in hot water. Pro tip: if youâ€™re making your own, pour the espresso first, then add the hot water.

coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: An espresso shot can be served solo or used as the foundation of most coffee drinks, like lattes and macchiatos.
